changeSet.sql:
CREATE TABLE expenses( num INT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, paydate DATE NOT NULL, value DECIMAL(10,0) NOT NULL, receiver INT NOT NULL,
PRIMARY KEY (num) );

changeSet.author: bachilolera
bachilolera
changeSet.sql: ALTER TABLE expenses ADD FOREIGN KEY (receiver) REFERENCES receivers(num);

changeSet.author: bachilolera
changeSet.sql: SELECT receivers.name, SUM(expenses.value) as total FROM receivers JOIN expenses ON receivers.num = expenses.receiver GROUP BY receivers.name;

changeSet.author: bachilolera
changeSet.sql: SELECT receivers.name, MAX(expenses.value) as max_payment, SUM(expenses.value) as total FROM receivers JOIN expenses ON receivers.num = expenses.receiver WHERE expenses.paydate = (SELECT paydate FROM expenses WHERE receiver = receivers.num ORDER BY value DESC LIMIT 1) GROUP BY receivers.name;

changeSet.author: bachilolera
changeSet.sql: SELECT receivers.name, MAX(daily_expenses.max_payment) as max_payment, daily_expenses.total FROM receivers JOIN (SELECT receiver, paydate, MAX(value) as max_payment, SUM(value) as total FROM expenses GROUP BY receiver, paydate) as daily_expenses ON receivers.num= daily_expenses.receiver WHERE daily_expenses.total = (SELECT total FROM (SELECT receiver, paydate, SUM(value) as total FROM expenses WHERE receiver = receivers.num GROUP BY receiver, paydate ORDER BY total DESC LIMIT 1) as subquery) GROUP BY receivers.name, daily_expenses.total;

changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE WORKER ( num INT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, birth_date VARCHAR(255) DEFAULT NULL, birth_place VARCHAR(255) DEFAULT NULL, active_year VARCHAR(255) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (num) );
